# [Interview #706: Alloy of Law Signing Report - Orome & Fejicus, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=706#8)

#### Fejicus

Is the size of speed bubbles affected by the strength of the allomancer?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
